channel.title: [508] Fixing Bulby PvP Bug [508]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Fixing Follow To Attack In Wilderness[/size]
[b]Base Containing The Bug:[/b] Bulby 508 Berky-Scape 508
[b]Difficulty:[/b] 1/10 Very simple, If you can follow instructions.
[size=12pt][b]Read before continuing:[/b][/size] If you have ever used a Bulby based server, then you will notice the 'follow' option to attack in wilderness. Well it's not hard to fix, but since a lot of people have Private Messaged me asking how I fixed it, I will make a Tutorial.
Before Picture: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/Follow.jpg[/img]
[b]1.[/b] Open up [b]player.java[/b], Which can be found in your servers Players folder.
[b]2.[/b] In Player.java, search [code]public boolean bountyArea(){[/code]
[b]3.[/b] Now under that, you will see Coordinates, similar to these [code]return absX >= 3085 && absX <= 3185 && absY >= 3662 && absY <= 3765;[/code]
[b]4.[/b] It might not be exact, but don't worry, simply replace what you see with these coordinates [code]return absX >= 2945 && absX <= 3379 && absY >= 3523 && absY <= 3961;[/code]
[b]5.[/b] Now is a good time to [b]Save[/b] - Remain Player.java opened, and search for [code]if(AtClanField() || AtDuel() || AtPits()[/code] [b]6.[/b] It's quite self explanatory, You want the 'attack' option for Clan Wars, Duel Arena, Fight Pits and now Wilderness. Replace it with [code]if(AtClanField() || AtDuel() || AtPits() || bountyArea())[/code] This adds bounty Area to this list, which can be used as a Wilderness.
[b]7.[/b] Finally, Save & Compile.
After Picture & Movie: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zlGTzORa0PM [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/bugfixed.jpg[/img]
I hope this helped.
Thanks, Justin :D

item.title: [508] Fixing Bulby PvP Bug [508]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

I found a easier way then this, and more necessary. Meaning, you can still have bounty hunter for use with as Bounty hunter, to challenge people. But this way will make it any where in wilderness you will have the ‘attack’ option. But will only scan in the bounty area for players to challenge. I will hopefully fix it up when I got time. In the mean time, this is what your going to have to use, which is pretty efficient as well.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Fixing Bulby PvP Bug [508]
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

i have a question about this, i created a pvp area like this…

[code]//PVP_________________________

public boolean AtPvp()
{
if(absX >= 1000 && absY >= 1000 && absX <= 5000 && absY <= 5000 && heightLevel == 4)

{
return true;
}
else
{
return false;
}
}
//______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/code]
and i have this as well…

if(AtClanField() || AtDuel() || AtPvp() || AtPits()) { frames.setPlayerOption(this, "Attack", 1); } else { frames.setPlayerOption(this, "Follow", 1); }

now it says attack and you can fight at the coordinates i have set but while in the bank it still says attack although you cant attack in the bank. How could i get it to say follow in the bank and attack in the pvp zone? i tried making the bank a safezone but i failed bad lol

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Fixing Bulby PvP Bug [508]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

                      [size=18pt]Fixing Follow To Attack In Wilderness[/size]

Base Containing The Bug:
Bulby 508
Berky-Scape 508

Difficulty:
1/10
Very simple, If you can follow instructions.

                                             [size=12pt][b]Read before continuing:[/b][/size]

If you have ever used a Bulby based server, then you will notice the ‘follow’ option to attack in wilderness. Well it’s not hard to fix, but since a lot of people have Private Messaged me asking how I fixed it, I will make a Tutorial.

Before Picture:

1. Open up player.java, Which can be found in your servers Players folder.

2. In Player.java, search

public boolean bountyArea(){

3. Now under that, you will see Coordinates, similar to these

return absX >= 3085 && absX <= 3185 && absY >= 3662 && absY <= 3765;

4. It might not be exact, but don’t worry, simply replace what you see with these coordinates

return absX >= 2945 && absX <= 3379 && absY >= 3523 && absY <= 3961;

5. Now is a good time to Save - Remain Player.java opened, and search for

if(AtClanField() || AtDuel() || AtPits()

6. It’s quite self explanatory, You want the ‘attack’ option for Clan Wars, Duel Arena, Fight Pits and now Wilderness. Replace it with

if(AtClanField() || AtDuel() || AtPits() || bountyArea())

This adds bounty Area to this list, which can be used as a Wilderness.

7. Finally, Save & Compile.

After Picture & Movie: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zlGTzORa0PM

I hope this helped.

Thanks,
Justin

Read full topic
